metadata.title: CVE-2024-35933 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: btintel: Fix null ptr deref in btintel_read_versionIf hci_cmd_sync_complete() is triggered and skb is NULL, thenhdev->req_skb is NULL, which will cause this issue.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
